verses.name: 2 Chronicles 9:27
verses.text: And the king made silver in Jerusalem as stones, and cedar trees made he as the sycomore trees that are in the low plains in abundance.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 9:28
verses.text: And they brought unto Solomon horses out of Egypt, and out of all lands.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 9:29
verses.text: Now the rest of the acts of Solomon, first and last, are they not written in the book of Nathan the prophet, and in the prophecy of Ahijah the Shilonite, and in the visions of Iddo the seer against Jeroboam the son of Nebat?

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 9:30
verses.text: And Solomon reigned in Jerusalem over all Israel forty years.
